title: Project Design Course Based on Active Learning in Marine Fields

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of Basic Maritime Terminology and Scientific Principles
context.additional_context: Development of field-applicable marine education projects for office/administrative working professionals

learning_goals: After analyzing maritime accident scenarios, learners can design decision-making processes for compliance with STCW standards.
Learners can independently plan and execute marine environment simulation projects using digital tools.
In problem-based learning, learners demonstrate the ability to propose creative solutions through peer assessment.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
